attributes.action: Helping the unemployed and benefits claimaints
attributes.additional_details:
Re Introduce  National Service.
Intregate the scout and guide movement  in schools as a precursor to a 2 year National service on leaving schol



 Use charismatic business entrepreneurs and philanthropists to head up the process based in empty premises  that are  casualties of the recession together with redundant army camps and ex military personnel


1)Fundamental teaching of the rights and responsibilites of citizen.Restablish the contract between the individual and society by,
2) Understanding  that a society works when its citizens accept  they have duties and obligations
to contribute for a healthyand successful   society, and in  return the citizen earns certain rights.
3) Build confidence and self esteem
4)Promote determination  and discipline
5)Encourage exercise and learn to live a healthy life without drugs or alcohol
6) Reading and writing skills
7)Practical skills for living
8)Work apprenticeship courses
